April 2022

Iâ€™ve been experimenting with dough variation, choosing a more pastry-style dough instead of something thatâ€™s traditionally bready.

Baking bread, to me, can instantly turn into failure if what I taste three hours later isnâ€™t as fluffy and fresh as it was when it came out of the oven. Julia Turshenâ€™s recipe for jam buns turns out to be perfect for challah.
